column4: I've searched for 2 ubuntu reccommended packages, "xgame" and "etswitch", etswitch doesn't work and xgame is hard as heck to locate
waht are you trying to install?
i'm trying to do something to FORCE a game to stop trapping the, for instance, ALT-TAB.
and rather let Windowmaker get it so I can alt-tab and switch/minimize
explains why i've never heard of it :-)
because it is hellish and near impossible to do, but i'm gonna do it by darn
a little -help- of course would be nice
any idea of how to do said task?
and no, there won't be a package for that
i dual boot for a reason :-)
and arcane perl scripts, and kernel hackery
and yes, i will rewrite a kernel if the bug is in that deep
